user.title: Gandi.net live DNS updater
user.description: This integration requires a unique Gandi API Key. If you donâ€™t have one yet, you can generate your production API key from the API Key Page (in the Security section).

user.title: Gandi.net live DNS updater options
user.description: Depending on how regular your ISP changes your external IP, you may need to change the check and update frequency. In most cases a frequency of 10 minutes is adequate.
